Horribly mediocre game that is only fun at all in single player vs bots. Casual is filled with hackers and extremely sweaty tryhards, while competitive has no hackers, but the tryhards are far worse. All guns that are automatic have horrible, unrealistic spray pattern bullshit you have to deal with. Only get this game as either on sale or a gift and for the love of GOD, PLEASE only play the single player. Meaning practice with bots. That is actually pretty fun and I can have a good time.
